version_description: iOS 9 bug fixes
iOS 9 bug fixes

We are super excited to announce the biggest update to the most popular logo creator app for iPhone and iPad.

InstaLogo Logo Creator is much better and all existing customers are getting it for free.

+ Beautiful new design
We have redesigned every major screen in the app to make everything fast and easy.

+ Apple Watch support
Free up your canvas while you are working with InstaLogo, a free app for your Apple Watch. InstaLogo gives you quick access to the core tools and colors right there on your wrist.

+ 3D Touch support
InstaLogo introduces exciting features for devices with 3D Touch.
-Just press on the InstaLogo icon on the Home screen to instantly create a new canvas.
-You can now draw with pressure sensitivity using your finger or a passive stylus. Increasing the amount of pressure in your stroke can increase the size of your drawing.
-Enjoy Peek and Pop actions as well. Peek at your logos and folders for a quick content preview. Pop to open the necessary one.

+ Slide Over and Split View support
Now you can open InstaLogo and any third-party applications – at the same time. (iPad only)

+ 1200+ new logos
This is simply the most wanted part of this major update, so we have 13 new logo categories – with over 1200 new logos – to inspire your creativity.

+ 270+ hand-picked Latin & non-Latin fonts
InstaLogo now contains a lot of cool fresh fonts to help you create more amazing logos.
Since we have a lot of non-English speaking users, we added amazing non-Latin fonts as well: Chinese, Japanese, Russian and Thai.



And here’s what else you’ll find:

+ Support for iPad Pro and Apple Pencil
+ InstaLogo now works on landscape and portrait mode as well
+ The ability to nudge an object left, right, up and down
+ Manipulate the proportions of every object freely: you can stretch images with sizing just height or width
+ Fill texts and logos with images
+ The ability to crop photos
+ The ability to crop the canvas
+ The ability to include more than 1 line of word when entering a text
+ Smart guide: place your objects more easily
+ The ability to lasso objects and edit them together
+ The ability to share your logos with Google Drive
+ Save the fonts that are frequently used
+ Language setting within the app
+ Font importing is a lot easier
+ Auto-save is now more reliable and provides better data protection
+ Tons of bug fixes

It would be great if you leave a review in the AppStore. It really encourages others to learn more about InstaLogo Logo Creator.

We are super excited to announce the biggest update to the most popular logo creator app for iPhone and iPad.

InstaLogo Logo Creator is much better and all existing customers are getting it for free.

+ Beautiful new design
We have redesigned every major screen in the app to make everything fast and easy.

+ Apple Watch support
Free up your canvas while you are working with InstaLogo, a free app for your Apple Watch. InstaLogo gives you quick access to the core tools and colors right there on your wrist.

+ 3D Touch support
InstaLogo introduces exciting features for devices with 3D Touch.
-Just press on the InstaLogo icon on the Home screen to instantly create a new canvas.
-You can now draw with pressure sensitivity using your finger or a passive stylus. Increasing the amount of pressure in your stroke can increase the size of your drawing.
-Enjoy Peek and Pop actions as well. Peek at your logos and folders for a quick content preview. Pop to open the necessary one.

+ Slide Over and Split View support
Now you can open InstaLogo and any third-party applications – at the same time. (iPad only)

+ 1200+ new logos
This is simply the most wanted part of this major update, so we have 13 new logo categories – with over 1200 new logos – to inspire your creativity.

+ 270+ hand-picked Latin & non-Latin fonts
InstaLogo now contains a lot of cool fresh fonts to help you create more amazing logos.
Since we have a lot of non-English speaking users, we added amazing non-Latin fonts as well: Chinese, Japanese, Russian and Thai.


And here’s what else you’ll find:

+ Support for iPad Pro and Apple Pencil
+ InstaLogo now works on landscape and portrait mode as well
+ The ability to nudge an object left, right, up and down
+ Manipulate the proportions of every object freely: you can stretch images with sizing just height or width
+ Fill texts and logos with images
+ The ability to crop photos
+ The ability to crop the canvas
+ The ability to include more than 1 line of word when entering a text
+ Smart guide: place your objects more easily
+ The ability to lasso objects and edit them together
+ The ability to share your logos with Google Drive
+ Save the fonts that are frequently used
+ Language setting within the app
+ Font importing is a lot easier
+ Auto-save is now more reliable and provides better data protection
+ Tons of bug fixes

It would be great if you leave a review in the AppStore. It really encourages others to learn more about InstaLogo Logo Creator.

- iOS 11 compatibility. InstaLogo is fully compatible with iOS 11 now.
- iMessage extension. Easily share logos without leaving your conversation, or send them as stickers.
- Full support of iPad Pro 10.5

- Extended color palette
- Numerous bug fixes and improvements

Thank you for using InstaLogo! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store we would really appreciate it.

InstaLogo now supports iPhone X!
This update also fixes bugs and provides performance improvements.
If you like the update - please leave us a review.
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
Bug fixes

- Created a tutorial that helps in discovering the most important features in the app
- iPhone X compatibility fixes
bug fixes

- Fixed an issue when some parts of texts were sometimes cut off
- Fixed slow photo importing on iOS 10
- Localization improvements
- bug fixes and minor changes
bug fixes

- fixed a bug regarding gradient background coloring
- fixed a text spacing crash

- From now we support Ukrainian language
- Bug fixes

Love the app? Please write a review and recommend it to your friends!

- One of the most requested feature is here: iCloud backup and sync.
Keep your logos safe with a backup. If you lose your device or get a new one, you can transfer your logos to your new device. Moreover, with this feature you can easily move your logos to another device to continue editing on it.

- Localization fixes
- Other bug fixes

- Generating a logo preview is much faster than previously
